episodes.title: Guarding Charles Manson at San Quentin Prison -Darren Monahan
episodes.description:
Soft White Underbelly interview and portrait of Darren Monahan, a former prison guard at San Quentin and undercover detective in the SF Bay area. 
Get 40% off access to world-wide perspectives on today's biggest news stories. Subscribe through my link https://ground.news/swu to unlock your unlimited monthly account today.

1:24 Video begins
1:49 Decision to Join the Hells Angels or Law Enforcement
3:06 Being a Correctional Officer at San Quentin Prison
6:30 Charles Manson Stories
11:30 Richard Ramirez and Other Well Known Inmates
19:00 Working at Solano State Prison
22:05 Did Working at a Prison Change You?
23:22 Becoming a Cop in the Most Dangerous City In the U.S.
24:35 Are Criminals All That Different From Cops?
28:24 Working In Undercover Narcotics
29:21 Undercover Stories
46:57 Portrait
47:35 House Party Murder Story
51;55 Worst Experience as a Police Officer
1:03:20 Most Important Lessons I've Learned
1:05:53 Society Has Gotten Too Soft
1:06:24 The Reality of Being a Cop
1:12;00 The Drug Problem In the U.S.
